name: Time is running
description:
You play a mage, that travels timeperiods to get more power. But timetravelling is bad for the body. Everyone knows that... So you age very fast!

Your age is your health. Luckily the mage invented magic stones, which can alter your age. Old to young and young to old.

The older you are the more damage and speed get your fireballs, also you use your magic to jump higher, but you see less of the gamescreen.

This short game was made for the GameDev.tv Community Jam and concludes just one timeperiod: Ancient Egypt. While you fight your way through a pyramid and defeat a boss in the last chamber, you get a few hints about the gods of egypt.

Music and part of the SFX  by: Soundimage.org, Eric Matyas

Some other SFX: Found on freesound.org

Everything else by me.

I hope you have fun with my game and please leave me a feedback.

Thanks a lot

Dominik / Exitus19
